title: Remove HP Partner First Silver badge card from Certifications section

requirements.summary: Remove the HP Partner First Silver badge card entirely from the Certifications component, and either remove the section or display a placeholder message if empty
acceptanceCriteria: The HP Partner First Silver badge card is no longer visible on the page.
No broken layout or empty card containers remain in the Certifications section.
All other sections (Header, Hero, Services, Products, AMC, Footer) remain unaffected.

file_operations.description: Remove the HP Partner First Silver badge card (including partner tier label and expiry date) from the component. Since this leaves the section empty, replace the content with a placeholder message such as 'No certifications are currently listed' or consider removing the card markup entirely while keeping the section heading. Ensure no empty card containers or broken layouts remain.
